Card.Name: Blink Dog
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: User Attacks a single enemy using its sharp teeth.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: User evades all damage this round; cannot be used twice in a row.

Card.Name: Harpy
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: User slashes at a single enemy using sharp claws.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: Target cannot target this creature for two rounds.

Card.Name: Bugbear
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: User atacks with a blunt weapon, targeting a single enemy.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: If user attacks before targeted enemy deal an additional three damage.

Card.Name: Faerie Dragon
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: User Attacks a single enemy using its sharp teeth.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: Target creature cannot act in the nect round of combat.

Card.Name: Fire Elemental
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: Set target on fire, target takes 3 damage at the start of the next round.

Card.Name: Duergar
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: Attack a single enemy with a converted pickaxe.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: Grow to twice the size "Large", dealing double damage.

Card.Name: Vine Blight
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: Grapple single target and delay its action by 3 initiative.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: Roots and vines sprout preventing movement reducing all damage by half.

Card.Name: Gnoll
Card.AbilityDescriptionOne: User attacks a single target with a long sharp weapon.
Card.AbilityDescriptionTwo: If this attack kills target enemy attack again targeting the enemy with the lowest health.
